title: A rare appreciation post
body:
After stalking the Behavior and Moderation boards for a while enjoying listening to toxic players whine I frequently saw the same boards users across different posts offering help or explanation to their complaints and I wanted to thank those users and also Riot Tantram for putting up with all these people because jeez some of these chat logs speak for themselves. 

So thanks Riot Tantram and all boards users who have productive responses, I appreciate ya

replies.body: Tantram appreciated this. Thanks!
Isn't it Tantram?
This guy gets it.
I remembered the story of how you got the name Tantram and was like wait that's not right. It has an A
From the perspective of someone who's unaware of the story... if s/he's dealing with unruly players, Tantrum seems like a fitting name.

I know! What makes it even better is that Tantram had the name before he was employed at Riot, due to the username Tantrum being taken in the games he played, he chose Tantram, and that carried over to Riot too!

I just don't understand why people like this are allowed to do this. You claim to be able to control in game behavior through the report system but it doesn't work and then people can just do this: https://docs.google.com/document/d/141128S_BwN51WV0ohP3HIO3VP6IOMlVqw5spyz5jMyY/edit?usp=sharing
idk how to post images so let me know if that doesnt work

In cases like that your best bet is to file a Support Ticket with the screenshot included. No ones ever claimed that the behavioral systems are perfect. and some people can slip through the cracks every now and then. However, the number of slip-throughs is small compared to the number of people who do get caught by the PB systems.
thanks but i was asking a riot employee not some random schmuck with nothing better to do than troll the leagueoflegends boards

> [{quoted}](name=Llib Setag,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=LOrAKdrX,comment-id=000100000000000100000000,timestamp=2017-02-05T02:54:50.566+0000)
>
> thanks but i was asking a riot employee not some random schmuck with nothing better to do than troll the leagueoflegends boards

Okay first off, Riot employees rarely respond to threads in this forum so you're mostly gonna get responses from other players here. The best way to get in touch with Riot directly is to file a Support Ticket. Second off, resorting to insults when you don't get the response you were looking for is a very poor way of going about looking for or receiving help.
Lol thanks for the life lesson. Do you charge for that advice or do i get this pro bono?
Yup. Fixed.

Hi Mr.DuckCurry My ig name is KingAzuran and i just wanted to ask you if you can help me with a 14 day ban on me. I read your post about 2 years ago and after that i do regret and vowed to change my ways on being toxic however i would like you to review my case. While i did say in chat that theres a new way to say the n word i did not say it to anyone directly in the chat. Also my team was very relaxed and ok with me saying that in chat. Its just after the game someone in my team the master yi used it against me for a bad game. In the actual game i did swear and curse but it was for my frustration against the yis play style while even though im writing this, I know what i did was wrong and promise I will change and be a better person after my ban! This gave me a better view in the mirror of how a bad person i am. Thanks for reading this! Also i plan to join your riot team after college soon! So i hope you and the company can forgive me! 
IG: KING AZURAN

This is nice and all, but I imagine the types of people that do this are all too modest to actually post a thanks.

Could even be why DuckCurry posted instead of RiotTantrum XD

EDIT: I usually don't vote in polls, but I will make an exception.
